sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap-v5' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutStepsAdmin from '../components/CheckoutStepsAdmin' import { createReceipt } from '../actions/receiptActions' import { RECEIPT_CART_CLEAR_ITEMS } from '../constants/receiptConstants' const PlaceReceiptScreen = ({ history }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const receiptCart = useSelector((state) => state.receiptCart) if (!receiptCart.supplier.address) { history.push('/admin/supplier') } // Calculate prices const addDecimals = (num) => { return (Math.round(num * 100) / 100).toFixed(2) } receiptCart.itemsPrice = addDecimals( receiptCart.receiptItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.importPrice * item.qty, 0) ) receiptCart.shippingPrice = addDecimals(receiptCart.itemsPrice > 100 ? 0 : 10) cart.totalPrice = ( Number(receiptCart.itemsPrice) + Number(creceiptCartart.shippingPrice) ).toFixed(2) const receiptCreate = useSelector((state) => state.receiptCreate) const { receipt, success, error } = receiptCreate useEffect(() => { if (success) { history.push(`/admin/order/${order._id}`) dispatch({ type: RECEIPT_CART_CLEAR_ITEMS }) } // eslint-disable-next-line }, [history, success]) const placeOrderHandler = () => { dispatch( createReceipt({ //--------- receiptItems: receipt.receiptItems, supplier: receipt.supplier, shippingPrice: receipt.shippingPrice, itemsPrice: receipt.itemsPrice, totalPrice: receipt.totalPrice, }) ) dispatch({ type: ORDER_PAY_RESET }) } return ( <>

Shipping

Supplier Name : {receipt.name}

Supplier Phone Number : {receipt.phone}

Supplier Address: {receipt.supplier.address}, {receipt.supplier.country}

Receipt Items

{receipt.receiptItems.length === 0 ? ( Your receipt is empty ) : ( {receipt.receiptItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.importPrice} = ${item.qty * item.importPrice} ))} )}

Receipt Summary

 Items ${receipt.itemsPrice} Shipping ${receipt.shippingPrice} Total ${receipt.totalPrice} {error && ( {{error}} )} ) } export default PlaceReceiptScreen
